pyrates.frontend.template.edge package¶

Submodules¶

pyrates.frontend.template.edge.edge module¶

class pyrates.frontend.template.edge.edge.EdgeTemplate(name: str, path: str, operators: Union[str, List[str], dict], description: str = 'A node or an edge.', label: str = None)[source]¶

Bases: pyrates.frontend.template.operator_graph.OperatorGraphTemplate

Generic template for an edge in the computational backend graph. A single edge may encompass several different operators. One template defines a typical structure of a given edge type.

target_ir¶

alias of pyrates.ir.edge.EdgeIR
